H0.text: Ulcer is caused by a virus.

H1.text: Malaria is caused by a virus.

H2.text: Tuberculosis is caused by a virus.

H3.text: Influenza is caused by a virus.

A4.text: Influenza viruses first cause infection by infecting epithelial cells in the respiratory tract.

A5.text: The viral life cycle begins by binding to a target cell. Binding is mediated by the viral HA proteins on the surface of the envelope, which bind to cells that contain sialic acid receptors on the surface of the cell membrane.
